channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-27247|2024-04-09T17:15:27.531Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for macOS
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for macOS before version 5.17.10 may allow a privileged user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27244|2024-05-15T20:46:37.922Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Workplace VDI App for Windows
item.description: Insufficient verification of data authenticity in the installer for Zoom Workplace VDI App for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27243|2024-05-15T20:37:45.264Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- see references
item.description: Buffer overflow in some Zoom Workplace Apps and SDKâ€™s may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-27242|2024-04-09T17:18:32.081Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for Linux
item.description: Cross site scripting in Zoom Desktop Client for Linux before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24699|2024-02-13T23:58:44.327Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Clients
item.description: Business logic error in some Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct information disclosure via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24695|2024-02-13T23:50:22.837Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows
item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct a disclosure of information via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24694|2024-04-09T17:13:08.845Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for Windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for Zoom Desktop Client for Windows before version 5.17.10 may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24698|2024-02-13T23:56:14.515Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Clients
item.description: Improper authentication in some Zoom clients may allow a privileged user to conduct a disclosure of information via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24693|2024-03-13T19:30:22.311Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Rooms Client for Windows
item.description: Improper access control in the installer for Zoom Rooms Client for Windows before version 5.17.5 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24692|2024-03-13T19:27:30.446Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Rooms Client for Windows
item.description: Race condition in the installer for Zoom Rooms Client for Windows before version 5.17.5 may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24691|2024-02-14T00:01:30.884Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows
item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows may allow an unauthenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24690|2024-02-14T00:00:04.089Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Clients
item.description: Improper input validation in some Zoom clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct a denial of service via network access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24697|2024-02-13T23:53:43.589Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Clients
item.description: Untrusted search path in some Zoom 32 bit Windows clients may allow an authenticated user to conduct an escalation of privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2024-24696|2024-02-13T23:51:34.285Z -- Zoom Video Communications, Inc. -- Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows
item.description: Improper input validation in Zoom Desktop Client for Windows, Zoom VDI Client for Windows, and Zoom Meeting SDK for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct a disclosure of information via network access.
